00032 using namespace std;
00033 using namespace Hypertable;

00038 void ScanContext::initialize(int64_t ts, ScanSpec *ss, RangeSpec *range_, SchemaPtr &sp) {
00039   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00040   uint32_t max_versions = 0;
00041 
00042   // set time interval
00043   if (ss) {
00044     interval.first = ss->time_interval.first;
00045     if (ts == 0)
00046       interval.second = ss->time_interval.second;
00047     else
00048       interval.second = (ss->time_interval.second != 0) ? std::min(ts, ss->time_interval.second) : ts;
00049   }
00050   else {
00051     interval.first = 0;
00052     interval.second = ts;
00053   }
00054 
00055   if (interval.second == 0)
00056     interval.second = END_OF_TIME;
00057 
00058   spec = ss;
00059   range = range_;
00060 
00061   if (spec == 0)
00062     memset(family_mask, true, 256*sizeof(bool));
00063   else {
00064     memset(family_mask, false, 256*sizeof(bool));
00065     max_versions = spec->max_versions;
00066   }
00067 
00068   memset(family_info, 0, 256*sizeof(CellFilterInfo));
00069 
00070   if (sp) {
00071 
00072     schema_ptr = sp;
00073     if (spec && spec->columns.size() > 0) {
00074       for (std::vector<const char *>::const_iterator iter = spec->columns.begin(); iter != spec->columns.end(); iter++) {
00075         cf = schema_ptr->get_column_family(*iter);
00076 
00077         if (cf == 0)
00078           throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_COLUMNFAMILY, *iter);
00079 
00080         family_mask[cf->id] = true;
00081         if (cf->ttl == 0)
00082           family_info[cf->id].cutoff_time = 0;
00083         else
00084           family_info[cf->id].cutoff_time = ts - ((uint64_t)cf->ttl * 1000000000LL);
00085         if (max_versions == 0)
00086           family_info[cf->id].max_versions = cf->max_versions;
00087         else {
00088           if (cf->max_versions == 0)
00089             family_info[cf->id].max_versions = max_versions;
00090           else
00091             family_info[cf->id].max_versions = (max_versions < cf->max_versions) ? max_versions : cf->max_versions;
00092         }
00093       }
00094     }
00095     else {
00096       list<Schema::AccessGroup *> *aglist = schema_ptr->get_access_group_list();
00097 
00098       family_mask[0] = true;  // ROW_DELETE records have 0 column family, so this allows them to pass through
00099       for (list<Schema::AccessGroup *>::iterator ag_it = aglist->begin(); ag_it != aglist->end(); ag_it++) {
00100         for (list<Schema::ColumnFamily *>::iterator cf_it = (*ag_it)->columns.begin(); cf_it != (*ag_it)->columns.end(); cf_it++) {
00101           if ((*cf_it)->id == 0)
00102             throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_SCHEMA_INVALID_CFID, (std::string)"Bad ID for Column Family '" + (*cf_it)->name + "'");
00103           family_mask[(*cf_it)->id] = true;
00104           if ((*cf_it)->ttl == 0)
00105             family_info[(*cf_it)->id].cutoff_time = 0;
00106           else
00107             family_info[(*cf_it)->id].cutoff_time = ts - ((uint64_t)(*cf_it)->ttl * 1000000000LL);
00108 
00109           if (max_versions == 0)
00110             family_info[(*cf_it)->id].max_versions = (*cf_it)->max_versions;
00111           else {
00112             if ((*cf_it)->max_versions == 0)
00113               family_info[(*cf_it)->id].max_versions = max_versions;
00114             else
00115               family_info[(*cf_it)->id].max_versions = (max_versions < (*cf_it)->max_versions) ? max_versions : (*cf_it)->max_versions;
00116           }
00117         }
00118       }
00119     }
00120   }
00121 
00125   if (spec) {
00126     if (!spec->row_intervals.empty()) {
00127 
00128       // start row
00129       start_row = spec->row_intervals[0].start;
00130       if (!spec->row_intervals[0].start_inclusive)
00131         start_row.append(1,1);  // bump to next row
00132 
00133       // end row
00134       if (spec->row_intervals[0].end[0] == 0)
00135         end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00136       else {
00137         end_row = spec->row_intervals[0].end;
00138         if (spec->row_intervals[0].end_inclusive) {
00139           uint8_t last_char = spec->row_intervals[0].end[end_row.length()-1];
00140           if (last_char == 0xff)
00141             end_row.append(1,1);    // bump to next row
00142           else
00143             end_row[end_row.length()-1] = (last_char+1);
00144         }
00145       }
00146     }
00147     else if (!spec->cell_intervals.empty()) {
00148       std::string column_family_str;
00149       Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00150 
00151       if (*spec->cell_intervals[0].start_column) {
00152         const char *ptr = strchr(spec->cell_intervals[0].start_column, ':');
00153         if (ptr == 0)
00154           HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC,
00155                    format("Bad cell spec (%s)", spec->cell_intervals[0].start_column));
00156         column_family_str = std::string(spec->cell_intervals[0].start_column, ptr-spec->cell_intervals[0].start_column);
00157         if ((cf = schema_ptr->get_column_family(column_family_str)) == 0)
00158           HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC,
00159                    format("Bad column family (%s)", column_family_str.c_str()));
00160         ptr++;
00161         start_row = spec->cell_intervals[0].start_row + std::string(1, 0) + std::string(1, (char)cf->id) + ptr;
00162         if (!spec->cell_intervals[0].start_inclusive)
00163           start_row.append(1,1);  // bump to next cell
00164       }
00165       else {
00166         // start row
00167         start_row = spec->cell_intervals[0].start_row;
00168       }
00169 
00170       if (*spec->cell_intervals[0].end_column) {
00171         const char *ptr = strchr(spec->cell_intervals[0].end_column, ':');
00172         if (ptr == 0)
00173           HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC,
00174                    format("Bad cell spec (%s)", spec->cell_intervals[0].end_column));
00175         column_family_str = std::string(spec->cell_intervals[0].end_column, ptr-spec->cell_intervals[0].end_column);
00176         if ((cf = schema_ptr->get_column_family(column_family_str)) == 0)
00177           HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC,
00178                    format("Bad column family (%s)", column_family_str.c_str()));
00179         ptr++;
00180         end_row = spec->cell_intervals[0].end_row + std::string(1, 0) + std::string(1, (char)cf->id) + ptr;
00181         if (spec->cell_intervals[0].end_inclusive)
00182           end_row.append(1,1);  // bump to next cell
00183       }
00184       else {
00185         // end row
00186         end_row = spec->cell_intervals[0].end_row;
00187       }
00188     }
00189     else {
00190       start_row = "";
00191       end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00192     }
00193 
00194     if (start_row.compare(end_row) > 0)
00195       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "start_cell > end_cell");
00196   }
00197   else {
00198     start_row = "";
00199     end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00200   }
00201 
00202 }
